documents.question: How much does ByteAI cost?
documents.answer: ByteAI has two plans: Pro at $99 per month with 10,000 API calls, and Business at $299 per month with unlimited calls. Both include 24/7 support and all features.

documents.question: Is there a free trial?
documents.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start.

documents.question: What can ByteAI do?
documents.answer: ByteAI is an AI assistant that can automate customer support, schedule appointments, answer questions, integrate with your systems, and handle phone calls 24/7.

documents.question: Does ByteAI support phone calls?
documents.answer: Yes! ByteAI can answer incoming phone calls, have natural conversations with customers, and take actions like booking appointments or transferring to human support.

documents.question: What languages does ByteAI support?
documents.answer: ByteAI currently supports English, Spanish, French, German, and Portuguese. More languages are being added regularly.

documents.question: What API keys do I need?
documents.answer: You'll need API keys from Anthropic (Claude), ElevenLabs (voice), and optionally OpenAI (embeddings). We provide detailed setup instructions in our documentation.

documents.question: How do I integrate ByteAI with my website?
documents.answer: ByteAI provides REST APIs, WebSocket connections, and SDKs for JavaScript, Python, and other languages. Integration typically takes 1-2 hours with our quick start guide.

documents.question: Is ByteAI secure?
documents.answer: Yes! ByteAI uses enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliance, and stores no customer data by default. All API keys are encrypted and never logged.

documents.question: How do I get help?
documents.answer: You can reach our support team 24/7 via email at support@byteai.com, live chat on our website, or by calling this phone number to speak with a human agent.

documents.question: What are your support hours?
documents.answer: Our AI assistant is available 24/7. Human support is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM Eastern Time, with emergency support available nights and weekends.

documents.question: How do I upgrade my plan?
documents.answer: You can upgrade your plan anytime from your account dashboard. The change takes effect immediately and you're only charged the prorated difference.

documents.question: Can I cancel anytime?
documents.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime with no penalties. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

documents.question: How does billing work?
documents.answer: We bill monthly via credit card or ACH. Enterprise customers can request annual billing with a discount. All plans include detailed usage analytics.

documents.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
documents.answer: I can help you schedule an appointment right now! Just tell me your preferred date and time, and I'll book it for you.

documents.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
documents.answer: Yes, you can reschedule by calling this number or through your account portal. Please provide at least 24 hours notice when possible.

documents.question: What are your appointment hours?
documents.answer: Appointments are available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time. We also offer limited weekend slots for urgent needs.

documents.question: The AI isn't responding correctly
documents.answer: If the AI seems confused, try rephrasing your question more simply. If the issue persists, I can transfer you to a human support agent who can help.

documents.question: I'm getting API errors
documents.answer: API errors are usually due to incorrect credentials or rate limits. Check that your API keys are valid and you haven't exceeded your plan's limits. Contact support if issues persist.

documents.question: The voice quality is poor
documents.answer: Poor voice quality can be caused by network issues. Try using a better internet connection. If the problem continues, let me know and I'll create a support ticket.

documents.question: What's the response time?
documents.answer: ByteAI typically responds in under 2 seconds from when you finish speaking. Response time depends on your internet connection and complexity of the question.

documents.question: Can ByteAI transfer calls?
documents.answer: Yes! If you need to speak with a human or if I can't help with something, I can transfer your call to our support team immediately.

documents.question: Does ByteAI remember past conversations?
documents.answer: ByteAI remembers context within a single call session. For account-specific information, it can look up your history using your phone number or account ID.

documents.question: Are there setup fees?
documents.answer: No setup fees! You only pay the monthly subscription. We also provide free onboarding and setup assistance for all new customers.

documents.question: Can I customize ByteAI's responses?
documents.answer: Yes! You can customize the AI's personality, knowledge base, and responses through the dashboard. Enterprise plans include custom voice training.

documents.question: Where is data stored?
documents.answer: Data is stored in US-based AWS data centers with encryption at rest and in transit. EU customers can request data residency in EU regions.
